column1: Uchi////Been to Uchi at least 4 times maybe more. Love it! Last time we overheard the couple next to us while sitting at the sushi bar
column2: that the dish the couple ordered the fish was frozen so they sent it back . Personally we have never experienced anything bad but for the price and the type of restaurant something like that should never
column3: ever Â happened. So we will be careful and not order cook food or maybe try some other popular sushi restaurant next
